MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH46 postcode area of Moreton, affecting properties in Leasowe Common, Lingham Lane, Moreton Common and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30 pm to complete repairs to a fault on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3:30 pm. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  11:23 am on 27th October, 2020.
